content: A dictionary is a reference work of words or terms which are listed in alphabetical order. The words and terms included in the dictionary are described in relation to their significance, definition, etymology, orthography and grammatical form.
translations: ita:Un dizionario Ã¨ un'opera di riferimento di parole o termini che sono elencati in ordine alfabetico. Le parole e termini
